item.description:
Hello Boston Chihuahua Members!!!

This is the other indoor space we're trying out. This location is only available on Saturdays and is right down the street from our old location. We are renting this space so the fee/cost has gone up.

You're welcome to attend both indoor meets in the month of May. We want your feedback on which venue you like best. I will set up some polls also located in the "more" section to gather some data from you to help shape our new location/time.

-Aimee
item.name: May 2012: Indoor Meetup @ Bark Place
